Texts.Chs: 地球和大地守护团都消失了。我渗透进组织的任务已经结束了。^green;我是时候回到^orange;远星庇护所^green;然后向监理人^green;^reset;的^orange;大统领扎哈德^green;汇报情况。
Texts.Eng: Earth and the Protectorate are gone. My mission to infiltrate the organization is over. ^green;It's time for me to head back to the ^orange;Starfarer's Refuge ^green;and report to ^orange;Commander Zaheed ^green;of the Watchers.^reset;

Texts.Chs: 回复位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;扎哈德^reset;
你做得很好，上尉。监理人们对你的努力表示感谢。当我与爱丽丝讨论你的发现时，你可以自由地做你想做的事情。当我有新的任务给你时，我会再联系你的。
Texts.Eng: You have done well, Captain. The Watchers are grateful for your efforts. You are free to do as you please while I discuss your findings with the Iris. I will contact you again when I have a new assignment for you.
